string.text:
Note: 
• Deployed IEDs and tripwire traps will disappear when you leave the current map. 
• Deployed IEDs and tripwire traps can be recovered. 
• Use a cellphone to detonate deployed IEDs.

Note: 
• Deployed drones will disappear when you leave the current map. 
• Hostile stalkers will shoot drones when flying close. 
• Mutants will be alert when drones flying close. 
• When drones being shotdown, attached explosive won't detonate and will disappear. 
 
Movement: 
 Key [Sprint] -> Fly up. 
 Key [Crouch] -> Fly down. 
 Key [Forward] -> Fly forward. 
 Key [Backward] -> Fly backward. 
 Key [Strafe left] -> Strafe left. 
 Key [Strafe right] -> Strafe right. 
 Key [Lean left] -> Steer left. 
 Key [Lean right] -> Steer right. 
 
Action: 
 Key [Use] -> Stop controlling drone. 
 Key [Zoom] -> Camera zoom, supports both hold and toggle modes.
